    • Method Detail

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        Description copied from class: RadComponent
        Returns the bounds of this RadComponent in the model.

        Caller should not modify this rectangle.

        Overrides:
        getBounds in class RadComponent
        Returns:
        the bounds of this RadComponent in the model coordinate system (e.g. unaffected by a view zoom for example)

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds(java.awt.Component relativeTo)
        Description copied from class: RadComponent
        Returns the bounds of this RadComponent in the coordinate system of the given Swing component. This will scale the coordinates if the view is zoomed (see DesignerEditorPanel.zoom(com.intellij.designer.designSurface.ZoomType)) and will apply any relative position offsets of views in the hierarchy between the two components.

        Returns a new Rectangle, so callers are free to modify the result.

        Overrides:
        getBounds in class RadComponent
        Parameters:
        relativeTo - the component whose coordinate system the model bounds should be shifted and scaled into
        Returns:
        the bounds of this RadComponent in the given coordinate system

      • fromModel

        public java.awt.Rectangle fromModel(java.awt.Component target,
                                    java.awt.Rectangle bounds)
        Description copied from class: RadComponent
        Converts the given rectangle (in model coordinates) to coordinates in the given target component's coordinate system. The model coordinate system refers to the same coordinate system as the bounds returned by RadComponent.getBounds().

        This means that calling RadComponent.getBounds(java.awt.Component) is equivalent to calling this method and passing in RadComponent.getBounds().

        Returns a new Rectangle, so callers are free to modify the result.

        Overrides:
        fromModel in class RadComponent
        Parameters:
        target - the component whose coordinate system the rectangle should be translated into
        bounds - the model rectangle to convert
        Returns:
        the rectangle converted to the coordinate system of the target

      • toModel

        public java.awt.Rectangle toModel(java.awt.Component source,
                                  java.awt.Rectangle rectangle)
        Description copied from class: RadComponent
        Converts the given rectangle (in coordinates relative to the given component) into the equivalent rectangle in model coordinates.

        Returns a new Rectangle, so callers are free to modify the result.

        Overrides:
        toModel in class RadComponent
        Parameters:
        source - the component which defines the coordinate system of the rectangle
        rectangle - the rectangle to be converted into model coordinates
        Returns:
        the rectangle converted to the model coordinate system

      • fromModel

        public java.awt.Point fromModel(java.awt.Component target,
                                java.awt.Point point)
        Description copied from class: RadComponent
        Converts the given point (in model coordinates) to coordinates in the given target component's coordinate system. The model coordinate system refers to the same coordinate system as the bounds returned by RadComponent.getBounds().

        Returns a new Point, so callers are free to modify the result.

        Overrides:
        fromModel in class RadComponent
        Parameters:
        target - the component whose coordinate system the point should be translated into
        point - the model point to convert
        Returns:
        the point converted to the coordinate system of the target

      • fromModel

        public java.awt.Dimension fromModel(java.awt.Component target,
                                    java.awt.Dimension size)
        Description copied from class: RadComponent
        Converts the given rectangle (in model coordinates) to coordinates in the given target component's coordinate system. The model coordinate system refers to the same coordinate system as the bounds returned by RadComponent.getBounds().

        Returns a new Dimension, so callers are free to modify the result.

        Overrides:
        fromModel in class RadComponent
        Parameters:
        target - the component whose coordinate system the dimension should be translated into
        size - the model dimension to convert
        Returns:
        the size converted to the coordinate system of the target

      • convertPoint

        public java.awt.Point convertPoint(java.awt.Component relativeFrom,
                                   int x,
                                   int y)
        Description copied from class: RadComponent
        Returns the point in the model coordinate space (see RadComponent.getBounds()) given a coordinate x, y in the given Swing component.

        Returns a new Point, so callers are free to modify the result.

        Overrides:
        convertPoint in class RadComponent
        Parameters:
        relativeFrom - the component whose coordinate system defines the rectangle
        x - the x coordinate of the point
        y - the y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        a corresponding Point in the model coordinate system
